sentences.english: In the world of international marketing, governments, quasi- government agencies, and profit-seeking and nonprofit entities are frequently buyers.
sentences.chinese: 以及贏利與非贏利實體都經常充當買家的角色。

sentences.english: In the world of international marketing, governments, quasi- government agencies, and profit-seeking and nonprofit entities are frequently buyers.
sentences.chinese: 以及贏利與非贏利實體都經常充當買家的角色。

sentences.english: This has created an unexpectedly profitable market for Roshan.
sentences.chinese: 這爲羅山帶來了出乎意料的贏利市場。

sentences.english: Our company turned a profit last year.
It is the point where operations result in neither a profit nor a loss.
sentences.chinese: 它是點，操作不導致贏利和損失。

sentences.english: The more goods he puts in, the better profits he earns.
sentences.chinese: 他經營的商品種類越多，贏利就越多。

sentences.english: Since he became manager, the company has been running in the black.
sentences.chinese: 自從他任經理以來，公司就一直贏利。

sentences.english: The tradesman balanced his losses against his profits.
sentences.chinese: 那商人把他的虧損跟贏利相抵。

sentences.english: It also earns money from advertising by furniture and home renovation companies on the website.
sentences.chinese: 此外，搜房網的家居和裝修的廣告也是其贏利點。

sentences.english: Industry watchers have pointed out that the firm still has no way of making money.
sentences.chinese: 產業分析家指出，公司仍未發現贏利點。

sentences.english: Experts say profit-earning capability is based on long-term performance.
sentences.chinese: 專家說贏利能力基於其長期表現。

sentences.english: A company which makes high profits must pay excess profits duty to the government.
sentences.chinese: 贏利高的公司須向政府交納額外所得稅。

sentences.english: Investment earnings in the industry, and risk factor analysis.
sentences.chinese: 投資該行業的贏利點和風險因素分析。

sentences.english: Every pageview of your web business has potential as an earning point.
sentences.chinese: 網站的每一瀏覽頁都是潛在的贏利點。

sentences.english: What are the 13-week average sales for our top five profitable products?
sentences.chinese: 我們前五個贏利產品的十三週平均銷售額爲多少？
